segments.text: Hi , Tina , I've got good news . I have successfully passed the first two rounds of interview with ABC Company . They informed me to go to the final round next Monday . It looks very promising .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is awesome . Congratulations ! I know you can make it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Let's go for a celebration this evening . Are you free ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Wait for me at the cafe down my office building . Say 5 PM , ok ?
segments.speaker: S2
